candidates.body:
Prevents unique `<namespace,msg>` pairs from "colliding" with the same value when using `union`
fixes #213

candidates.title: [p2p/utils] Implement `Requester` (Using `PrioritySet`)
candidates.body:
Related: #180 

`Requester` was implemented hastily in `commonware-consensus::authority/backfiller`. This is a cleaner and well-tested implementation of the same intertwined logic: https://github.com/commonwarexyz/monorepo/blob/bb8497a131e79ba04dfa2735c674860448bd2568/consensus/src/authority/actors/voter/actor.rs.

candidates.title: [storage] Add `index` to `Archive`
candidates.body:
Related: #175 (Finalized Height <> Block index)

- [x] Track which files changed since last sync and call sync on those rather than in `put` (also update Journal)
- [x] Add `index` to `put` and infer `section`
- [x] Ensure we handle case in Archive where last record is too short (even if key successfully read)
- [x] How to prune ~`IntervalTree`~ (use `rangemap`)?
- [x] Update comments

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

- **New Features**
	- Introduced a new dependency for enhanced storage capabilities.
	- Implemented improved handling of keys and indices in the Archive module, including a new `Identifier` type.
	- Enhanced buffer management in the Journal module for better data handling.

- **Bug Fixes**
	- Improved error handling for duplicate indices and blob boundary checks in the Journal's replay method.

- **Documentation**
	- Updated comments and documentation for clarity on new functionalities and changes.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

candidates.title: [cryptography/bls12381] Construct and Verify Aggregate Signatures
candidates.body:
This pull request introduces several new benchmarking functions and refactors existing ones in the `cryptography` module, particularly focused on the BLS12-381 cryptographic operations. Additionally, it includes updates to documentation and test cases to reflect these changes.

### New Benchmarking Functions:
* Added `benchmark_partial_signature_aggregation` in `cryptography/src/bls12381/benches/partial_signature_aggregation.rs` to benchmark partial signature aggregation.
* Added `benchmark_signature_verify_aggregation` in `cryptography/src/bls12381/benches/signature_verify_aggregation.rs` to benchmark signature verification with aggregation.

### Refactoring and Updates:
* Refactored `benchmark_signature_aggregation` in `cryptography/src/bls12381/benches/signature_aggregation.rs` to use a different set of messages and updated the aggregation logic.
* Updated documentation in `cryptography/src/bls12381/mod.rs` to reflect new and updated benchmarks, including partial signature aggregation and aggregate signature verification. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-f8bc317b1c83024f0e59342c78474c0566e1e44f6eee99af9162520f0edaeb05L11-R11) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-f8bc317b1c83024f0e59342c78474c0566e1e44f6eee99af9162520f0edaeb05L62-R62) [[3]](diffhunk://#diff-f8bc317b1c83024f0e59342c78474c0566e1e44f6eee99af9162520f0edaeb05R73-R122)
* Renamed functions and updated test cases to use `partial_aggregate` instead of `aggregate` for partial signature aggregation in `cryptography/src/bls12381/mod.rs` and `cryptography/src/bls12381/primitives/ops.rs`. [[1]](diffhunk://#diff-f8bc317b1c83024f0e59342c78474c0566e1e44f6eee99af9162520f0edaeb05L96-R139) [[2]](diffhunk://#diff-b94a6904036bbf18e106e71697add22b2b12c7422e8522684e2301f91762dc1aL77-R79)

### Code Enhancements:
* Added new error type `DuplicateMessage` in `cryptography/src/bls12381/primitives/mod.rs` to handle duplicate message scenarios in signature aggregation.
* Introduced new functions `aggregate` and `verify_aggregate` in `cryptography/src/bls12381/primitives/ops.rs` for aggregating multiple signatures and verifying them.

These changes collectively enhance the benchmarking capabilities and improve the handling of signature aggregation and verification in the cryptographic module.

candidates.title: [release] 11/6/24
candidates.body:
This pull request includes version updates for the `commonware-storage` dependency in the project. The changes ensure that the latest version of the `commonware-storage` library is used.

Version updates:

* [`Cargo.toml`](diffhunk://#diff-2e9d962a08321605940b5a657135052fbcef87b5e360662bb527c96d9a615542L19-R19): Updated `commonware-storage` version from `0.0.3` to `0.0.4`.
* [`storage/Cargo.toml`](diffhunk://#diff-1bc5295720b3cef85cb02ee50bf34162eeabbbbac323d766e7faa38599da5d57L5-R5): Updated `commonware-storage` version from `0.0.3` to `0.0.4`.

candidates.title: [release] 11/5/24
candidates.body:
This pull request includes several version updates for various dependencies and a documentation improvement. The most important changes include updating the versions of multiple `commonware` crates and adding details to the documentation for the `macros::select!` implementation.

Dependency version updates:

* [`Cargo.toml`](diffhunk://#diff-2e9d962a08321605940b5a657135052fbcef87b5e360662bb527c96d9a615542L15-R20): Updated versions for `commonware-cryptography`, `commonware-macros`, `commonware-p2p`, `commonware-runtime`, `commonware-storage`, and `commonware-utils`.
* [`cryptography/Cargo.toml`](diffhunk://#diff-939918f71e6979dfb52d74cb04f30452ba12e40e04afa38a7b43c09bfd33f60dL5-R5): Updated version from `0.0.11` to `0.0.12`.
* [`examples/chat/Cargo.toml`](diffhunk://#diff-a3ad88990350c3c7832d4772385482bd7cf9ce312385fc96e972dfdcb669073cL5-R5): Updated version from `0.0.24` to `0.0.25`.
* [`examples/vrf/Cargo.toml`](diffhunk://#diff-c1fa76e33a4010b027be21dadc2c115e1213164bb89b810d59868612060fbf8fL5-R5): Updated version from `0.0.11` to `0.0.12`.
* [`macros/Cargo.toml`](diffhunk://#diff-8f8d4d6e0fe204c781061cda8ccf902914990001e641e61ca2c7c181e386d4dbL5-R5): Updated version from `0.0.3` to `0.0.4`.
* [`p2p/Cargo.toml`](diffhunk://#diff-7ce6932131a510b474d426db64d28e1d74ed38a4fda375e6b4e57505f1aec799L5-R5): Updated version from `0.0.22` to `0.0.23`.
* [`runtime/Cargo.toml`](diffhunk://#diff-6431a3eec6e102bbcffb94387cda89efbe02002649745273fb575234c0018de4L5-R5): Updated version from `0.0.8` to `0.0.9`.
* [`storage/Cargo.toml`](diffhunk://#diff-1bc5295720b3cef85cb02ee50bf34162eeabbbbac323d766e7faa38599da5d57L5-R5): Updated version from `0.0.2` to `0.0.3`.
* [`utils/Cargo.toml`](diffhunk://#diff-be66a7c8cc643dffaf26a57da4cb33a32a8d5e3bf5d8494dd17a9b2d48b7ff2eL5-R5): Updated version from `0.0.3` to `0.0.4`.

Documentation improvement:

* [`macros/src/lib.rs`](diffhunk://#diff-4feb5862b96e70d6a225028210762f9a2d19ea5e35860fe78d211fb607c82b26R176-R181): Added details about fusing and pinning futures in the `SelectInput` implementation.

candidates.title: [runtime] Migrate `Storage`/`Blob` Operations to Immutable References
candidates.body:
This change makes it more ergonomic for `runtime`'s to manage synchronization/efficient concurrent access.

## TODO
- [x] Require blob to be cloneable 
- [x] Modify `prune` behavior based on benchmark results
- [x] Only enforce uniqueness in same section (don't need to check for block hash conflicts in a range of blocks outside of our current)...uniqueness should be enforced by the application layer
- [x] Add metrics
- [x] Add `sync (partition)` to `Archive`
- [ ] ~Migrate `tokio::runtime` to use `mmap2` with advice support (sequential for journal, random after) -> add to `blob` interface~ -> prior to `mmap` must `set_len` on the file prior to writing to avoid panic...will move this change to a future PR: #154
- [ ] ~Error if multiple instances of same blob open (don't use file descriptors with cursors underneath, so no benefit to allowing)~ Leave to the application to manage

candidates.title: [storage] Introduce `Archive`
candidates.body:
<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

- **New Features**
	- Introduced a new `Archive` module for a write-once key-value store optimized for high throughput and low-latency reads.
	- Added benchmarking capabilities for `HashMap` operations to evaluate performance.
	- New dependencies added to enhance functionality, including `prometheus-client` and `rand`.

- **Bug Fixes**
	- Enhanced error handling in the journal module for various scenarios.

- **Documentation**
	- Comprehensive documentation added for the `journal` module and the `Archive` module, including usage and error handling.

- **Tests**
	- Expanded test coverage for new features and error handling scenarios.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## TODO:
- [x] Support Blob cloning for concurrent access: #153 
- [x] Add tests for `storage::archive`
- [x] Add extensive documentation for both `Journal` and `Archive` (like `p2p::authenticated`): #160
- [x] Switch to lazy index pruning to reduce RAM usage: #158 
- [x] Don't allow pruning backwards (can't prune at a lower index): #158 
- [x] Avoid reading entire journal on replay with skip reads: #159 
- [x] Handle byte corruption differently than truncation (don't try to fix): #159
- [x] Separate metric for unnecessary prefix reads vs full reads
- [x] Consider removing padding from `Index` (u32 requires 4 extra bytes of padding) -> could store more of the key to minimize extra reads or change to u32 offset: #161 
- [x] Add test for approaching edge of max journal size: #161 
- [x] Add note that "alive" sections result in one open blob (i.e. file): #161 
- [x] Add compression support (like in `p2p`)

- **Bug Fixes**
	- Improved error handling across various modules, including blob operations and data integrity checks.

- **Documentation**
	- Updated README and blog entries to reflect changes in terminology and new functionalities.

- **Chores**

candidates.title: [consensus] Extract unrelated changes
candidates.body:
Related: #111 

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

- **New Features**
	- Introduced a new function `union` for concatenating byte slices.
	- Added a new method `len` to the `Scheme` trait for retrieving byte lengths of cryptographic elements.
	- Implemented a `timeout` feature in the deterministic runtime for execution duration control.
	- Added a new procedural macro `test_async` for defining asynchronous test functions.
	- Updated P2P module to enhance link configuration parameters.

- **Documentation**
	- Enhanced documentation for macros and added examples for the new `test_async` macro.

- **Tests**
	- Expanded test coverage for new features, including tests for the `union` function and timeout functionality in the runtime.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

- **Documentation**
